lead_paragraph: The News Corporation, whose holdings include The Wall Street Journal and the Fox News Channel, has donated $1 million to the United States Chamber of Commerce, the business advocacy group that is among the heaviest anti-Democratic advertisers in this year's elections.
snippet: The donation is the News Corporation's second known contribution to a group that is advertising heavily to support Republicans this year.

headline.main: News Corp. Donates $1 Million to U.S. Chamber of Commerce

abstract: The donation is the News Corporation's second known contribution to a group that is advertising heavily to support Republicans this year.
